name: GA Ontology (Gap Analysis)
description: Gap analysis ontology for identifying gaps, assessing threats and opportunities, structural holes, priority scoring, and generating phased implementation recommendations with expected outcomes.

components.GapAnalysisReport: Top-level container for a complete gap analysis engagement
components.IdentifiedGap: Specific gap between current state and desired state
components.GapEvidence: Quantitative or qualitative evidence supporting a gap
components.BusinessImpact: Business consequences of a gap remaining unaddressed
components.StructuralHole: Network position where bridging would create value
components.BridgeConcept: Concept or initiative that bridges a structural hole
components.ThreatAssessment: Threat analysis linked to an identified gap
components.OpportunityAssessment: Opportunity analysis linked to an identified gap
components.PriorityMatrix: Scoring framework for ranking gaps and recommendations
components.PriorityQuadrant: Named quadrant within a priority matrix
components.RankedItem: Scored item placed in a priority quadrant
components.Recommendation: Actionable recommendation derived from gap analysis
components.ImplementationPhase: Phased execution step for a recommendation
components.ExpectedOutcome: Anticipated result of implementing a recommendation
components.OutcomeMetric: Measurable KPI for tracking an expected outcome

crossOntology.name: analysesOrganizationContext
crossOntology.purpose: ORG-CONTEXT → GA: Organization context drives gap analysis

crossOntology.name: assessesAgainstStrategy
crossOntology.purpose: GA → VSOM: Gap analysis benchmarks against strategic framework

crossOntology.name: assessesAgainstLandscape
crossOntology.purpose: GA → CL: Gap analysis uses competitive landscape data

crossOntology.name: evidencedByMaturity
crossOntology.purpose: GA → ORG-MAT: Gaps evidenced by maturity dimension scores

crossOntology.name: alignsToObjective
crossOntology.purpose: GA → VSOM: Recommendations align to strategic objectives

crossOntology.name: spawnsProject
crossOntology.purpose: GA → PPM: Recommendations spawn implementation projects

crossOntology.name: targetsMarketSegment
crossOntology.purpose: GA → CL: Opportunities target specific market segments

crossOntology.name: addressesCompetitorProfile
crossOntology.purpose: GA → CL: Threats assessed against competitor profiles

versionHistory.changes: Initial OAA v5 compliance with 18 entities, 30 relationships

OAA v6.1.0 upgrade: 30 relationships (22 internal + 8 cross-ontology) forming single connected component, 8 business rules with IF-THEN format, crossOntologyReferences with keyBridges for ORG-CTX/VSOM/CL/ORG-MAT/PPM bridges, all 18 entities fully connected

notes: Analysis ontology bridging strategy and execution via recommendations that spawn projects. Bridges ORG-CONTEXT, VSOM, CL, and ORG-MAT for comprehensive gap assessment.
